summary: The AI Industry Prosperity Index reflects robust growth driven by aggressive hyperscaler investments and sustained GPU demand. Meta raised its 2024 Capex forecast to $35-40B (up 46% YoY), Microsoft plans ~$50B in Capex (prioritizing AI infrastructure), and Google expects to exceed $30B. AWS is also increasing spend on AI accelerators. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.23/hr (down from 2023 peaks but well above historical lows), indicating balanced supply-demand dynamics. Anticipation for GPT-5 (2025 release) and Gemini 2 further fuels market optimism.
